fn.p: The following information was supplied regarding data availability:
R script to create the shape from cut rasters to train MaxEnt is uploaded as Supplemental File.

Huemul deer data is available in the cited references and governmental agencies of Chile and Argentina. However, some data is restricted because they belong to private forestry companies. In addition, huemul is critically endangered deer and uploading the specific location of this deer could compromise the species due to poaching. Thus, for ethical reasons, the data cannot be freely accessed.
